job_tasks.phrase: design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the core activities of software development, focusing on building robust backend systems.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows
job_tasks.justification: This describes the task of embedding AI functionalities into existing or new software applications, which is a software development responsibility.
Building services specifically for cloud environments is a key aspect of modern software development.
CI/CD pipelines are a central component of operations engineering, ensuring efficient and automated software delivery.
Ensuring the security and reliability of software systems is a fundamental software development and operations task.

job_tasks.phrase: shape the future of AI-powered customer service
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business domain and its strategic direction, aligning technical work with business goals.
Contributing to the technical roadmap requires an understanding of business objectives and how technology can support them.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and optimize scalable backend services
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the development and optimization of backend services, a core software development task.
Managing and developing cloud-based infrastructure is part of modern software development practices.
Designing and developing REST APIs is a standard software development activity.
Architecture refinement is a key task in software development to ensure scalability and performance.
Monitoring systems is crucial for operations engineering to ensure the health and performance of deployed applications.
Security is an integral part of software development, ensuring the protection of systems and data.
Optimizing deployments is a direct responsibility within operations engineering, ensuring smooth and efficient releases.

soft_skills.phrase: Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists
working with the CTO and engineering team

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software development and operations (CI/CD, cloud infrastructure, APIs), with only a mention of integrating AI models. It lacks specific details about building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile.
